# 互联网公司常用框架源码赏析

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/hulianwang-gongsi-changyong-kuangjia-yuanma-shangxi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/hulianwang-gongsi-changyong-kuangjia-yuanma-shangxi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install hulianwang-gongsi-changyong-kuangjia-yuanma-shangxi
hulianwang-gongsi-changyong-kuangjia-yuanma-shangxi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g hulianwang-gongsi-changyong-kuangjia-yuanma-shangxi
hulianwang-gongsi-changyong-kuangjia-yuanma-shangxi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
